sentences.sentence: It makes sense to buy at dealer prices so you can maximize your profits if you resell.
sentences.translation: 以批发价格买进是有道理的，如果你再转卖就可以最大化你的利润。

sentences.sentence: Staff members of a luxury brand may buy its old stock at cheaper prices, but they are not allowed to resell them.
sentences.translation: 奢侈品品牌的职员可以以更低的价格购买旧库存，但不允许转售。

sentences.sentence: When customers do want to toss their pair, they can give them back to the store, which will repurpose and resell them.
sentences.translation: 当顾客真的想扔掉它们时，他们可以把它们还给商店，商店会重新利用并转售它们。
